data.title: Ceo of Indian Company From HR Background
data.meta_description:
Ceo of Indian Company From Hr Background - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document discusses several individuals who have moved from HR leadership roles to CEO or COO roles in various companies in India. Some key points:

- Yasho Verma moved from head of HR at LG Electronics in India to COO of the company. 

- Santrupt Misra was director of group HR at Aditya Birla group and also became CEO of the group's Carbon Black business. 

- Several others moved from senior HR roles to leadership positions like chairman or managing director, including at companies like SAIL, NTPC, PowerGrid, and Hindustan Petroleum. 

- The document also discusses the careers and backgrounds of several CEOs and founders of consulting firms, including their
